body:
intel parallel studio download issue:
Attempted direct download from intel.com but seems like registration+email verification is required. Also the files are rather large (~5GB) for download to personal computer and re-upload to HPC cluster. 

### Steps to reproduce the issue
```console
$ spack install intel@19.0.3
==> Installing intel
==> Searching for binary cache of intel
==> Finding buildcaches in file:/home/amuralid/spack-mirror-2019-08-27/build_cache
==> No binary for intel found: installing from source
==> Warning: There is no checksum on file to fetch intel@19.0.3 safely.
==>   Fetch anyway? [y/N] y
==> Fetching with no checksum.
  Add a checksum or use --no-checksum to skip this check.
==> Fetching http://registrationcenter-download.intel.com/akdlm/irc_nas/tec/14832/parallel_studio_xe_19.0.3.tgz
######################################################################## 100.0%
curl: (22) The requested URL returned error: 404 Not Found
==> Fetching from http://registrationcenter-download.intel.com/akdlm/irc_nas/tec/14832/parallel_studio_xe_19.0.3.tgz failed.
==> Error: FetchError: All fetchers failed for intel-19.0.3-xyknikco2tp6w5b2bw6blsonmyasf2a7
```
title: intel parallel studio: broken URL
